feed.title: BirdNET-Analyzer Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for BirdNET-Analyzer: v1.3.1
entry.content:
What has changed

  • Fixed the bug in segments that prevented using audio and result files from different folders
  • Fixed the bug that showed the splash-screen during analysis in the windows version
  • Fixed the bug that audio could not be played in the mac version

entry.title: New release for BirdNET-Analyzer: v1.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add portuguese-BR translations to the GUI by @LSMSugai in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/439
  • Russian GUI translation by Александр Цветков by @max-mauermann in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/448 (Thanks to Alexander-R1BAF)
  • Fixed append-training in installed version of the GUI by @max-mauermann in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/456
  • writing the states and settings jsons is now more robust by @max-mauermann in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/457
  • changed single analysis result header to hh:mm:ss format by @max-mauermann in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/460
  • in GUI batch-analysis the order of the result files is now aligned with the order of the input files by @max-mauermann in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/473
  • the GUI now resets the loaded custom classifier before starting the analysis by @max-mauermann in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/473
  • model params after training now include the model version + an additional csv containing the number of samples for each class-combination by @max-mauermann in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/473
  • native windows directory selection dialog by @nishantnnb in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/473
  • updated chinese labels by @RockerLee in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/473
  • Gui refactor by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/473
  • added labels for bg, ca el, he, hr, in, is, lt, ml, sr by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/480
  • single file analysis output can display utf-8 characters by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/482
  • Updated to Gradio 5 by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/489
  • added some validation to the gui and fixed folder selection issues for training cache by @max-mauermann in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/491

New Contributors

  • @LSMSugai made their first contribution in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/439
  • @tommy4st made their first contribution in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/492

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/compare/v1.3.1...1.4.0

entry.title: New release for BirdNET-Analyzer: v1.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fixed the update notification by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/505
  • added optional spectrogram to single file analysis tab by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/506
  • more readable font colors by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/507
  • added ascii logo to analyzer by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/500
  • updated russian translation by Александр Цветков by @max-mauermann in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/508
  • Single file tab plays selected segments in result table by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/509
  • portuguese labels are now actually portuguese and not english (Thanks @Mattk70) by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/515
  • better GUI exception for empty training classes by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/513
  • allow single class review in review tab by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/520

New Contributors

  • @kdarras made their first contribution in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/503
  • @tvoirand made their first contribution in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/514

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/compare/1.4.0...v1.5.0

entry.title: New release for BirdNET-Analyzer:
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Download buttons for regression and spectrogram plots in review tab by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/529
  • correct audio segment gets played in single file tab result by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/530
  • updated server.py and client.py to work with current analyze.py by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/532

New Contributors

  • @Olindn made their first contribution in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/517
  • @kenshih made their first contribution in https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/526

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kahst/BirdNET-Analyzer/compare/v1.5.0...v1.5.1

entry.title: New release for BirdNET-Analyzer: v2.0.0
entry.content:
Breaking

  • Remove r table output type by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/549
  • Rework CLI args (see documentation) by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/564
  • Change how sensitivity works by @kahst in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/578 and https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/579

What's Changed

  • Save batch analysis args by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/548
  • Allow easier usage of old BirdNET models by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/550
  • Add audio speed modification for ultra- and infrasonic recordings by @kahst in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/557
  • Add top_n argument, to only save the top N predictions for each segment by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/577
  • Added map to species selection tab by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/583
  • Added review tab keyboard shortcuts by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/582 and https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/591
  • Add arg to merge consecutive detections by @kahst in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/593
  • Embeddings with hoplite database by @max-mauermann in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/562
  • Startup performance by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/599
  • Single file tab now gives error messages for invalid audio files by @max-mauermann in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/603
  • Indonesian language support for GUI by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/605
  • Updated Finnish labels by @jarnoh in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/629
  • Added option to switch to dark theme by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/621
  • Finnish and Swedish translations for GUI by @tphakala in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/631
  • Better error logging in GUI + CLI by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/639
  • Added hidden file exclusion for MacOS in review and segments by @yurish in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/635
  • Fixed bug that prevented the error_log to be written to userdir by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/641
  • Add known network/cloud shortcuts to allowed paths on windows by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/642
  • Performance app by Rene Heinrich and @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/645
  • The locale selection list now respects locales like en_uk and pt_br by @max-mauermann in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/643
  • Allow result download + segment download in single file tab by @Josef-Haupt in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/647
  • Conditional parameters in tuner by @max-mauermann in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/421
  • Allow to use test data for training by @kahst in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/652
  • Improve custom classifier training by @kahst in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/654

New Contributors

  • @cbowns made their first contribution in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/540
  • @jarnoh made their first contribution in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/629
  • @yurish made their first contribution in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/627
  • @tphakala made their first contribution in https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/pull/631

Full Changelog: https://github.com/birdnet-team/BirdNET-Analyzer/compare/v1.5.1...v2.0.0
